weaknesses: Weak visual hierarchy - elements lack clear size/importance variation
Too much whitespace - may feel empty
Low color contrast - may affect readability
Text readability could be improved
Brightness may be too high or too low
recommendations: Increase size contrast between primary and secondary elements
Consider adding more content or reducing spacing
Increase contrast between text and background colors
Adjust text color, size, or background for better readability
Adjust overall brightness for better visual comfort
Consider standard screen aspect ratios (16:9, 16:10)
